header: The events we hope to hold in 2021

events.title: 21st Anniversary
events.html:
The Library has been in it's current building for 21 years and we intend to celebrate by hosting several events throughout the year.
We will be purchasing at least 210 books for the library, your suggestions are most welcome.

events.title: I SPY Trail
events.html:
Click on the links in the image to take part

Or download the instructions from here (also available from the library).

events.title: Summer Reading Challenge
events.html: The subject this year will be “Wild World Heroes”.

events.title: Authors' Evening
events.tickets: Tickets are £5 (to include a glass of wine or a soft drink) and will be available in the library from June 21st
events.html:
This year our invited speakers will be two wonderful Oxfordshire writers,

Sylvia Vetta    author of Brushstrokes in Time, Not so Black and White

Loraine Fergusson    author of The Angel, A Serpent’s Tooth

events.title: Summer Holidays
events.html: During the summer we will be organising several events for children aged 5 - 11.

events.title: Art Pod Workshop
events.tickets: Tickets will be on sale in the Library from 1st July. The subsidised ticket price will be £5 per child (second child in the family £2)

events.title: Lego Masters
events.tickets: Tickets will be on sale in the Library from 1st July. The subsidised ticket price will be £5 per child (second child in the family £2)

events.title: Zoo Lab
events.tickets: Tickets will be on sale in the Library from 1st July. The subsidised ticket price will be £5 per child (second child in the family £2)

events.title: Creative Writing Workshop
events.html: This event will be run by Poet and Children’s writer Rachel Piercy her pamphlets - The Flower and the Plough, Rivers Wanted and Disappointing Alice and her new picture book - If you go down to the woods today.

events.title: FoSCL Quiz
events.html:
Friday 8th October in Sonning Common Village Hall

Our Quiz Masters will be Jill and John Hutchinson and there will be a raffle and of course a bar with wine, beer, soft drinks and nibbles.

events.title: AGM
events.html: The Agenda will be sent out in October.

events.title: Christmas Celebration
events.html: Do come and join us in the Library on Wednesday 22nd December from 2.30 pm.
